articles.author: Chuck DeVore
articles.title: Even the Rose Bowl left California in 2020 for Texas. Can the Golden State get anything right? - Fox Business
articles.description: New Year’s Day, 2021, the 105th Annual Rose Bowl was supposed to be played in Pasadena, California. Guess what happened...
articles.content: On New Year’s Day 2021 the 105th Annual Rose Bowl was supposed to be played in Pasadena, California. Instead, it will be played 270 miles north of Pasadena—Pasadena, Texas that is, in the AT&T St… [+4556 chars]
